revised_title: Royal Society Members' Obituaries and Achievements (1974)
tldr: This article from the Royal Society's Notes and Records highlights the obituaries and notable achievements of various members in 1974. The members contributed to diverse fields such as mathematics, genetics, chemistry, physics, biology, and engineering. Their work ranged from understanding DNA replication to developing practical applications in industry and medicine.
